item.title: Embracing The Cloud
item.description: Embrace the cloud with these tips. Trust Your Cloud Provider If you are going to be using the cloud, you need to trust that your provider’s services are going to be operational. Writing code defensively or testing that a particular service is working is a waste of time. Let your services fail. As long as your monitoring strategy is strong, you’ll know when an issue arises. Embrace Asynchronicity AWS Lambda Functions are triggered by events – HTTP, SQS, Cron, SNS, Streams – to name a few.
